text: nant inheritance - Blindness - Chronic monilial nail infection - Chronic mucocutaneous candidiasis - Coarse hair - Congenital onset - Cor pulmonale - Corneal neovascularization - Eosinophilia - Esotropia - Fibrocystic lung disease - Keratoconjunctivitis - Opacification of the corneal stroma - Pneumonia - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database.
